customManagers.depNameTemplate: https://github.com/{{# if (equals depName 'copilot.vim') }}github{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'lazy.nvim') }}folke{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'mason-lspconfig.nvim') }}williamboman{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'mason.nvim') }}williamboman{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'nvim-lspconfig') }}neovim{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'nvim-treesitter') }}nvim-treesitter{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'rustaceanvim') }}mrcjkb{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'trouble.nvim') }}folke{{/if}}/{{depName}}
customManagers.currentValueTemplate: {{# if (equals depName 'copilot.vim') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'lazy.nvim') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'mason-lspconfig.nvim') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'mason.nvim') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'nvim-lspconfig') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'nvim-treesitter') }}master{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'rustaceanvim') }}main{{/if}}{{# if (equals depName 'trouble.nvim') }}main{{/if}}
